sentences.en: A multiplication sign indicates the multiplicative relationship between two numbers.
sentences.cn: 乘号表示两个数字相乘的关系.

sentences.en: A multiplicative constitutive model of hyperelastoplasticity is adopted to simulate large deformation.
sentences.cn: 为模拟更大的变形采用了极分解的乘法超弹塑性本构模型.

sentences.en: A multiplicative constitutive model of the hyperelastic - plasticity is used to simulate the large deformations.
sentences.cn: 采用乘法分解 超 弹塑性本构模型,以便模拟更大的变形.

sentences.en: A new multiplicative group, Braid array, is constructed through a series of basic changes in the second part, and we conclude that any tame knot or link can be represented by finite braid array.
sentences.cn: 第二部分，由于辫子群与纽结理论的密切联系，本文构造了一个类似于矩阵的乘法群——辫子阵群，并给出了它的一系列基本变换，且得到所有温良纽结或环链都可由有限阶辫子阵惟一表示。

sentences.en: ACCURATE ALGORITHM FOR NUMERICAL SIMULATION OF NONLINEAR STOCHASTIC PROCESS DRIVED BY MULTIPLICATIVE COLORED NOISE.
sentences.cn: 倍增色噪声激励的非线性随机过程的精确数值模拟.

sentences.en: An implementation for computing multiplicative inverses in Galois fields GF ( 2 m ) is presented.
sentences.cn: 在扩展欧几里得算法的基础上提出了有限域乘法逆元的计算方法.

sentences.en: As you build these kinds of simulations, or anything like this, you need to think through whether things should be multiplicative or additive.
sentences.cn: 正如你建立各种仿真程序，或者类似的仿真程序时，你应该去想一想，他们应该是用加法还是用乘法。 。

sentences.en: Like many similar programs, it can handle multiplicative scale changes.
sentences.cn: 像许多类似的方案，它可以处理乘法规模的变化。

sentences.en: The common image noise is the main additive noise, multiplicative noise and quantization noise.
sentences.cn: 图像的常见噪声主要有加性噪声 、 乘性噪声和量化噪声等.

sentences.en: The multiplicative complexity of the two - dimensional discrete Hartley trans ( ? ) m of size 2~ n ×2~ n, where (? )
sentences.cn: 本文研究了长度为2~n×2 ~n ( n为正整数 ) 二 维 离散哈特莱 ( Hartley ) 变换的乘法复杂性.

sentences.en: We study the semirings additive reduct are semilattices and multiplicative reduct are rectangular groups.
sentences.cn: 研究了加法半群为半格、乘法半群为矩形群的半环.

words.tran_cn: [数] 乘数；[电子] 倍增器；增加者；繁殖者
乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘
